Consideration 5: Does a digital tool inherently aid lesson planning?

Some digital tools may provide the option of creating and sharing lesson plans, or to evaluate about the overall structure of the lesson.

Other tools, like learning management systems, may provide different ways to provide a lesson structure for the pupils, where you can create discussions and share materials or assignments.

Tip: Some tools or digital learning materials have inherent tips for teachers, like pacing, reflective questions, or suggestions for learner work.

These are good to revise and consider beforehand.

Other digital tools, like educational games, can serve as a lesson plan itself, but be mindful that there should always be a more comprehensive plan in place that can address the simple question of why the game is being played at a particular moment.
